Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: Your Discord bot token from https://discord.com/developers/applications. REQUIRED.

Config.Name: Plex URL
Config.Description: Your Plex server URL (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:32400). REQUIRED.

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Your Plex authentication token. Get it from https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/. REQUIRED.

Config.Name: Lavalink Host
Config.Description: Hostname of the Lavalink container. Use 'lavalink' if using the companion container.

Config.Name: Lavalink Password
Config.Description: Lavalink server password. Should match the password configured in Lavalink.

Config.Name: Use Modern Player
Config.Description: Use modern visual player (true) or classic embed style (false).

Config.Name: Static Player Channel ID
Config.Description: Discord channel ID for static player. Only used if USE_STATIC_PLAYER_CHANNEL is true.

Config.Name: Logging Level
Config.Description: Global logging level (DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR).

Config.Name: Source Code Directory
Config.Description: Mount point for PlexBot source code (enables auto-updates if git repo). Optional.
